plugin-framework plugin_common.utilities module¶

  • Index
plugin_common.utilities.decode_version(ver_str: str) → tuple[int, int, int]¶

Converts a string version number in the form major.minor.micro to an tuple of integers so that two version numbers can be reliably compared

Parameters:

ver_str – the version number in string form

Returns:

the version number as a tuple of three integers

Return type:

tuple[int, int, int]

plugin_common.utilities.find_project_root(node: Optional[Path] = None) → Path¶

This function starts with the provided file system node, or the location of the plugin_source package and works its way down the tree until it locates a directory that does not contain an __init__.py file and is not the src directory.

Parameters:

node –

Returns:

the project root path

Return type:

pathlib.Path

plugin_common.utilities.whereami(package_name: str) → Path¶

Returns a Path object pointing to the location of the application’s package folder

Returns:

the path of the application’s package directory

Return type:

pathlib.Path
